original_title: GACKT×東京フィルハーモニー交響楽団「華麗なるクラシックの夕べ」
overview: Features GACKT's first concert with an orchestra, "Kareinaru Classic no Yube," in which his songs are newly arranged in classical music style backed by Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra.
title: Gackt X Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra -A Splendid Evening of Classic-
